mapper.select: select count(integration_id) as checkRowNum from landing.s_org_ext soe where integration_id = #{integrationId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO landing.if_in_channel_partner_inf_wf_type( partnertype , par_row_id , created , created_by , last_upd , last_upd_by )values
( #{item.partnerType} , #{rowId} , now() , 'interface' , now() , 'interface' )

INSERT INTO landing.if_in_channel_partner_inf_wf_position( position , par_row_id , created , created_by , last_upd , last_upd_by )values
( #{item.position} , #{rowId} , now() , 'interface' , now() , 'interface' )
mapper.update: update landing.S_ORG_PRTNR set PTSHP_END_DT = to_date(#{partnerEndDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') , last_upd = now() , last_upd_by = 'interface' where par_row_id = #{rowId}
